page.title: 14RODMARTON ESTATE FARM
page.content: {Size of}farm:1700 acres. 1100 acres in {cereals}-winter wheat,winter oats, winter oil seed rape, spring barley, peas,spring wheat.150 dairy cows,200 beef cattle,60 ewes,400 acres grass,60 acres woodland.{Machinery-}tractors, combine,bailer,drill,ploughs,harrows, rolls, forage harvester for silage, mower for hay, muck spreader. Favourite {make of machinery }Massey Ferguson. Most{profitable crop }winter wheat.11 tractors .11 {workers.}175% lambs per year.{Animal feed- }grass, barley,wheat,oats,bought food containing imported stuff as well as home grown. {Animals sold }in Cirencester market.{Milk}goes to Milk Marketing Board by tanker each day.{ {Crops }sold to grain merchant and taken away by lorry. {Field sports- } Fox hunting with Beaufort Hunt, Beagling,Shooting. 3{generators.}
